thread.title: Manchester United fans travelling to Rostov in Europa League may face hooligans who admit to targeting England supporters
thread.title_full: Manchester United fans travelling to Rostov in Europa League may face hooligans who admit to targeting England supporters

author: fnathan
title: Manchester United fans travelling to Rostov in Europa League may face hooligans who admit to targeting England supporters
text:
EFL 'Our opponents are naturally the English' Manchester United fans travelling to Rostov in Europa League may face hooligans who admit to targeting England supporters 
Just last week, a documentary travelled to the Russian city where Rostov fans fight in woods and treat football violence as a way of life By Fred Nathan
